Dear Friends,

I have a class which has got some private methods with a return type of void. I am using a class(PivilegedAccessor referred in junit faqs) to invoke these private methods. Can anyone tell me how to access the variables inside this private method. These variables are local to thier methods.

Any advice will be highly appreciated.

Thanks,
Ajay.
